ctx: intros u v m n H1 H2 H3 H4.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall n m : Z, 0 <= m -> n * m = 1 -> n = 1 /\\ m = 1" on hypothesis of type "u = 1".

ctx: intros u v m n H1 H2 H3 H4.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros u v m n H1 H2 H3 H4.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall n m : Z, 0 <= m -> n * m = 1 -> n = 1 /\\ m = 1" on hypothesis of type "v = 1".

original: intros u v m n H1 H2 H3 H4. split. - intro contra. apply H1. apply Z.eq_mul_1_nonneg' in contra. destruct contra as [contra1 contra2]. rewrite contra1, contra2 in H3. rewrite Z.add_0_r in H3. apply Z.mul_eq in H3. destruct H3; congruence. - intro contra. apply H2. apply Z.eq_mul_1_nonneg' in contra. destruct contra as [contra1 contra2]. rewrite contra1, contra2 in H4. rewrite Z.sub_0_r in H4. apply Z.mul_eq in H4. destruct H4; congruence.
